successes.title: "For the Love of Spock" - A Documentary Film
successes.description: Because of YOU, Adam & Leonard Nimoy's plan to create a #SpockDoc is becoming a reality! Thank you all for your support!

Pledges.description: LIVE LONG AND PROSPER
Thank you so much for joining our mission to complete "For The Love Of Spock!" As our newest crew member, you'll receive exclusive updates from our mission and our eternal gratitude.
ENTERPRISE TRAVEL LOG

In addition to our exclusive updates throughout our mission together, we'll send you a one-of-a-kind digital (PDF) bundle of SPOCK collectables including historic magazine articles, home photography, and rare interviews with Leonard and the Nimoy family.
MOVIE NIGHT ON THE ENTERPRISE
In addition to the one-of-a-kind digital bundle of SPOCK collectables, you'll be one of the first to stream our "For the Love of Spock" film along with a special introduction and Q&A with the team.

** This stream will be available PRIOR to the official general release, for a limited timeframe - TBD based on our premiere and general release. Backers will get exclusive updates as we get closer to our release, and will receive a private email link with instructions on how to view.  **
KEY CREW ON ENTERPRISE
You will be forever listed by name in OUR FILM CREDITS and on our WEBSITE as special thank you for your contribution. Plus the private film stream, SPOCK bundle and exclusive updates.
CREWMAN 1ST CLASS

You go above and beyond! As a thank you, in addition to EVERYTHING up to the $50 level, you will receive an additional digital video bundle, which includes NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN interviews of Leonard, and "Leonard Nimoy's Boston;" a special half-hour documentary directed by son Adam about Leonard's life growing up in the west end of Boston.
SPOCK MOSAIC
Don't miss out! Be a part of an iconic and exclusive poster of SPOCK!

At this level, you'll receive EVERYTHING from the previous levels, but you'll also get to send us a photo of yourself (cosplaying, giving the vulcan salute, anything appropriate and Spock related!) to be included in an exclusive mosaic poster making up an image of Mr. Spock!
Who knows, maybe your image will be a part of our official marketing campaign or the film itself!

** Alright, so we can't guarantee the mosaic will be used in the final film, BUT even if it doesn't make the cut, we'll include it as a poster on our website and send you a special high-resolution digital version with the ability to zoom in and find your photo! **
SPOCK SWAG PACKAGE

For those who want limited edition, physical goodies tied to the film, this is the package for you. IN ADDITION TO EVERYTHING up to the $100 level (bundles, film stream, name in credits, and mosaic!), you'll also get:

- An "I GROK THE #SpockDoc" T-Shirt
- An LLAP temporary tattoo
- A silicone "SpockDoc" wristband
- A LLAP / SpockDoc magnet
Check out the image on the Kickstarter page for reference! (Suggested artwork used for illustrative purposes, may vary slightlyâ€¦ send us your own ideas, if you like!)
BIG-EARED ALIEN (VOICES)

So, you've got big ears that are ready to hear some classic stories told on audio book by Leonard Nimoy and John de Lancie (Q from the continuing series)! These "Alien Voices" series CD audio books are all signed by Leonard (and a lucky two, also by John!), and feature great, classic H.G. Wells, Jules Verne, and Sir Arthur Conan Doyle tales dramatized by all-star casts on CD (one story per package, though some are multiple disks).

These are first come, first served -- only 2 of the 9 come with John's signature as well. Unfortunately won't be able to promise your choice of story, but we assure you they are all GREAT classic adventures!
STANDALONE OFFER -- (but we'll send you both SPOCK digital bundles, private film stream, and will include your name in our credits and website).

BIG-EARED ALIEN (VOICES)... II
(or should that be... Q?)

Not content with hearing Leonard Nimoy and John de Lancie read classic adventures, you want to hear SPOCK and Q together! You got it -- this multi-voice dramatization of "SPOCK VS. Q: THE SEQUEL" includes a great adventure with the two characters together in this "Alien Voices" CD audiobook, and the original packing autographed by Leonard.
STANDALONE OFFER -- (but we'll send you both SPOCK digital bundles, private film stream, and will include your name in our credits and website).
THE JAMES T. KIRK

Straight from Adam's meeting with William Shatner himself, get a glossy photo from the Nimoy archives with Bill's autograph (only). These are extremely limited, and each one is different - some color, some black & white -- all press kit stills from ST:TOS or ST II, either group cast photos or Spock & Kirk. Each includes a thank you and letter of authentication from Adam Nimoy.
These are first come, first served -- unfortunately won't be able to promise the choice of which one you get, but we assure you they are all a GREAT addition to any collection.
STANDALONE OFFER -- (but we'll send you both SPOCK digital bundles, private film stream, and will include your name in our credits and website).
LOS ANGELES TREKKIES

Receive two tickets to a special LA screening with the team (and the unofficial after party). See the film BEFORE the official general release!  Who knows, maybe you'll even score a hot seat next to Adam.
STANDALONE OFFER -- (but we'll send you both SPOCK digital bundles and include your name in our credits and website).
(Travel not included, date TBA based around official premiere and general release dates)
NEW YORK TREKKIES
